```{r}
#| label: libraries

library(ggplot2)
library(scales)
library(ggthemes)
library(tibble)
```

```{r}
set.seed(1)
n <- 50
dat <- tibble(
  x0 = runif(n),
  y0 = runif(n),
  x1 = x0 + runif(n, min = -.2, max = .2),
  y1 = y0 + runif(n, min = -.2, max = .2),
  shade = runif(n), 
  size = runif(n)
)
```
